pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plots Surfaces of Rates of Mortality Improvement // Provides the possibility to plot Lexis surface maps (heat maps) of rates of mortality improvement. Raw data to be plotted can be read from the Human Mortality Database using code originally written by Tim Riffe. The European Research Council has provided financial support under the European Community's Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007-2013) / ERC grant agreement no. 263744.
